alert.note: Alert for Cullman (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 5:49PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Cullman County through 630 PM CST... At 548 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Smith Dam, or 8 miles south of Arley, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cullman, Hanceville, Good Hope, Dodge City, Baldwin, Vinemont, West Point, Garden City, Colony and Phelan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for north central Alabama.
